A

App - Class in gremlins
 
App() - Constructor for class gremlins.App
Constructor of App
Attack - Class in gremlins
 
Attack(int, int, String) - Constructor for class gremlins.Attack
Constructor of Attack, required x,y coordinate and direction of attack
attack(App) - Method in class gremlins.Gremlin
Create a slime base on the location and direction of gremlin cooldown status becomes true after attack
attack(App) - Method in class gremlins.RedGremlin
Create a red slime base on the location and direction of red gremlin Cooldown status becomes true after attack
attack(App) - Method in class gremlins.Wizard
Create a Fireball base on the location and direction of wizard Cooldown becomes true after wizard attack
attack_collision_check(App) - Static method in class gremlins.Attack
Detect collision between wizard, fireball, gremlin, red gremlin, and slime, and red slime If the distance between fireball and slime (or red slime) is less than 20 pixel, they both disappear If the distance between fireball and gremlin (or red gremlin) is less than 20 pixel Then, fireball is absorbed, gremlin respawns, and if red gremlin's lives is less or equal to 0, it respwans.

C

Character - Class in gremlins
 
Character(int, int) - Constructor for class gremlins.Character
Constructor of Charactor, required x and y coordinate
character_collision_check(App) - Static method in class gremlins.Character
If the distance between wizard and the gremlins or red gremlins is less than 20 pixel, decrease the lives of wizard by 1 and the wizard respawn when wizard is not invincible If the lives of wizard is less or equal to 0, then player loses
choose_direction(App) - Method in class gremlins.Enemy
If the gremlin hits a wall with more than one possible new direction to go in, it will randomly choose a new direction but wonâ€™t go back the way it just came.
collision(App) - Method in class gremlins.Character
Detect which direction is not obstacled in 8 direction.
collision_check(App) - Method in class gremlins.Fireball
Check the fireball collides brickwall or stonewall If it hits brickwall, remove the fireball, break the brickwall, and start the breaking animation If it hits stonewall, just remove the fireball
collision_check(App) - Method in class gremlins.RedSlime
Check the red slime collides brickwall or stonewall If it hits brickwall or stonewall, just remove the slime
collision_check(App) - Method in class gremlins.Slime
Check the slime collides brickwall or stonewall If it hits brickwall or stonewall, just remove the slime
configPath - Variable in class gremlins.App
Path of config file

cooldown_count - Variable in class gremlins.Character

current_lives - Variable in class gremlins.App
